name: Lull Away
description:
A Yume Nikki Fangame I started a long time ago at this point.

Play as Sora, exploring her dreams because her internet is out and there's not really anything to see or do in town.

It's a pretty traditional fangame, so there's not much to say.

Things I'll add in future versions:

  • More events
  • Obligatory GB world
  • More accessible effects/Gimmicks
